Congratulations Guy, what an achievement!

Robin/OR


  ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
  From: Guy<mailto:yzzzguy@...>

ps.com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
  Sent: Friday, January 04, 2008 6:=
07 AM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Got my ego stroked! (LOL)


  Doug and ScottL of=
 Ghostly Talk Internet Radio had a panel discussion 
  with Marcus Leader, =
Mark Macy, Jim Hale and Dr. Stephen Rorke on ITC 
  back on December 9.

  =
http://www.ghostlytalk.com/node/1494<http://www.ghostlytalk.com/node/1494>
=

  About 2 1/2 hours into the show - Doug, ScottL, Mark Macy, Jim Hale and =

  Dr. Rorke acknowledged me for my research contribution into the 
  Spiri=
com story.

  I hope to have my own web page up soon with those research re=
sults and 
  maybe even more data.

  Guy Jackson
